short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension attempts to discover and hide all cookie / GDPR dialogs found on web pages

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Each day more and more web pages are bombarding us with dialogs we must dismiss. Usually the dialog requires quite a bit of fine motor control to dismiss. Nuke Dialog does it for you by discovering these dialogs and hiding them do you don't have to. The only UI this extension provides is a "disable for origin" button which allows one to turn off the operation for the current web page's domain.
